name: 1231 Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed in the 1231 hotel in Torun for an Irish friends wedding to a local Polish girl.
reviews.title: Wedding in Poland

reviews.text: The hotel is just wonderful, in keeping with typical old Polish design but with all the modern necessities.
reviews.title: Great hotel to stay in Torun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Totally spotless, food was excellent, the downstairs rooms for the wedding were so cosy and almost hidden away, perfect for a wedding of 70-80 guests.
reviews.title: A jewel in a beautiful town.

reviews.text: Very centrally located, close to the town and the river. Absolutely no negatives whatsoever and very reasonably priced, €70 per room if memory serves.
reviews.title: A pleasure to stay at Hotel 1231

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And Torun itself is a lovely town, very typically Polish, not overrun with tourists, but yet has some of the best Western stores in the main shopping area, and yes some excellent pubs and clubs for drinking their rather strong vodka!
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located next to the river the hotel is easy to find by car, with guarded parking offered at 30zl a night. Both a positive. The town center is relatively small with the main square accesible by foot in under 10 minutes.
reviews.title: Great quiet location just off the town center, restaurant (dinner + breakfast) marvellous.

reviews.text: Like a previous reviewer I would put the rooms closer to a five and four star, being very clean and spacious. The bed were nice and firm. An improvement to the bathroom could be made by adding a shower curtain to the shower (in our bath), which reduces the odds of turning the room into a watercircus while taking a shower.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had both dinner and breakfast in the hotel, both rated marvellous. Service was excellent and preparation and taste of food very good. Choice in breakfast was vast, with eggs/omelets served a-la carte. I loved the pates.
reviews.title: hotel 1231 torun

reviews.text: Overall a very nice stay getting very good value for money. The excellent rating is compared to the region. Torun itself is a nice town for a one-day visit but not much longer, be sure to ascend the clocktower which offers great views.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: The hotel is stuated on the quiet street eventhough it is in the city center. The hotel used to be an ancient mill which was built in the 13th century. It's completly renovated inside and the restored facade remains more or less orginal. We had a twin big room overlooking the ruins of Teutonic. The room was comfortable and equipped with bicycle ergometer. The staff was very polite and attentive. I can really recommend this!
reviews.title: Hotel 1231 Torun

reviews.text: Very nice hotel. Great location. Friendly staff. Good service.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: I spent two nights in this wonderful hotel, an old mill that was converted in a hotel. it preserves the ancient structure, but furnitures and facilities are modern. You can also use the free wi-fi and a meeting room is available on the ground floor. I also had a fantastic dinner outside (but it was in June, the year before), just under the medieval "bathroom".. The hotel is also very well located, and from here you can visit the enchanting old town of Torun.
reviews.title: Wonderful place in Torun

reviews.text: Our visit to Torun was our most favorite in Poland. From this hotel you can walk easily to Old and New Town. Be certain to stop along the way and dine at the Dragon's Eye ~ a great restaurant a bit less formal. The hotel staff are most gracious. The rooms lovely and very clean. The hotel's restaurant is superior!
reviews.title: Charming.

reviews.text: My sister and I just returned from a 16 day trip through Poland, and our stay at the 1231 contributed to making Torun one of our favorite spots. The hotel is lovely, and the restaurant was a real treat. The hotel is in a lovely quiet spot, but so convenient to the main square. Do travel down some of the side streets to discover the hidden gems of Torun. A great stay in a lovely town.
reviews.title: Enchanting Hotel in a Lovely Setting

reviews.text: When you find this place, you might have trouble getting there like we did because there is a construction right before you enter the hotel and it looks like its a dead end but actually there is a passage way (small gate) and you will see the hotel in front of you!
reviews.title: Great Hotel, you will not regret!

reviews.text: Hotel 1231 is a super hotel, very comfortable and highly specified rooms, lovely service at all times. First-class restaurant with great food & wine selection, great choice of options at breakfast. The staff were very helpful and welcoming throughout our stay. Car parking secure, cheap and pretty close by. I would recommend this hotel very highly, it is one of the best in Torun.
reviews.title: 1231 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect location - among Teutonian Knights' castle ruins, close to the Vistula river and Old Town Market. I like staying in places which haven' been designed as hotels/guesthouses. "1231" used to be a water mill and you can still see the trail of the origin function. And I really liked the noise of waterfall which used to move the mill wheel in the past :-) - it's a part of exceptionality of this hotel and it's sorrounding.
reviews.title: beautiful place

reviews.text: Nice warm welcome by friendly English speaking staff. Really nice clean room although a little dark and with a bit of noise from the water mill outside but it wasn't really bad. Generally really nice an I will stay there again next time for sure.
reviews.title: Clean, friendly and really nice place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed this boutique hotel. Close enough to walk to everything. only one problem which we quickly rectified.....there was a plug in air fresher, which was not needed, or welcomed. but we unplugged it, opened the windows and everything was good. the room was very clean and the bed comfortable. really enjoyed the hotel and the town.
reviews.title: one of the nicest hotels

reviews.text: Hotel 1231 is a clean, well kept, no frills hotel in a great location in Torun. The main tourist attractions, water front and Torun Miasto train station are all within easy walking distance.
reviews.title: Good hotel option for Torun.

description: The boutique style 1231 Hotel offers 23 cozy, comfortable single and double rooms, with unique and charming atmosphere. Each room has air conditioning system, Internet access, LCD TV with cable TV, telephone, mini bar and bathroom with shower or bathtub and hairdryer.
